channel.title: Modern Warfare 2 Stimulus Package
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt][b]ARE YOU SUFFERING FROM [url=http://www.mapathy.com/]MAPATHY?[/url][/b][/size]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dz0p1Hs2CvY&fmt=22&annotation_id=annotation_729669&feature=iv
[b]Release Dates:[/b] Xbox 360: 30th march PS3: 30th April (or longer)
[b]Cost:[/b] 1200 MS Points (£10.28 in old money).
[b]Features:[/b] The two original maps making a triumphant comeback are 'Crash' and 'Overgrown' Two from Call of Duty 4 and three new ones [/center]

item.title: Modern Warfare 2 Stimulus Package
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

i still cant join any games lol i try joining em… TDM 4000 games playing and i cant join any of em… yet for all my other games i can join straight away and have a low ping of 30 on some servers

Read full topic

item.title: Modern Warfare 2 Stimulus Package
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I just played my first few games of BC2, and I am already impressed. The game isn’t extremely unrealistic like MW2, and I highly enjoy the bullet dropping with sniping. I can’t give a full opinion on it (I only have an hour played), but I can tell it’s going to be a lot more fun to play on some days.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

Frell:

I completely agree, i wish infinityshit would fix stuff instead of acting like everythings fine.

blame activision.

its not like cod was any good to begin with though (as far as fps goes, also shut face speljohan)

Read full topic

item.title: Modern Warfare 2 Stimulus Package
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

BC2 is arranged in squads, so its a team of 12 vs 12, each team made up of 3 squads of 4. You can choose to spawn behind one of your squad mates or you can choose to spawn in where it wants you to spawn, so you’re always safe.

Read full topic

item.title: Modern Warfare 2 Stimulus Package
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

The first thing that pissed me off with the stimulus package was that they didn’t even bother to fix the spawns. You can immediately be noobtubed at the beginning of the match, which was always a problem on most maps. We can even bring up the fact that most nukes are formed by spawn-trapping(which is how I got my nuke on Wasteland). Here is a tip IW: If I just died there, please don’t spawn me in the same place.

I’m also sick of the “this gun” owns “that gun”, teammates “unable” to shoot down air support, and the spawn system the most. I’m really hoping that I will enjoy BC2 much more.

Sorry for complaining, but it’s a broken game.

Read full topic

item.title: Modern Warfare 2 Stimulus Package
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

I completely agree, i wish infinityshit would fix stuff instead of acting like everythings fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Modern Warfare 2 Stimulus Package
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Frell:

It does, bc2 is really good. But you’ll get bored of it alot slower than you did mw2 and when you do get bored of it youll feel like playing mw2.

Well many people have said that BC2 doesn’t really give you the “I just died from bullshit” feeling, which is the main reason I feel like getting off of MW2 in the first place. It seems that every game in MW2 is either:

A) Full of noobtubes (even worse with OMA Pro + Danger Close)
B) Full of campers
C) Full of whiny 9 year olds who won’t stfu
D) Marathon/Lightweight/Commando rushers, flying 10 feet up a flight of stairs to stab you in the limb and immediately kill you

I’m not trying to whine about it completely, but it would be nice to have a game with action, not just explosives and knives killing you every spawn. I’ve also heard you can’t go prone in BC2, which really cuts down camping.

Read full topic

item.title: Modern Warfare 2 Stimulus Package
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Chassy13:

I bought the stimulus package and I do enjoy playing Storm and Salvage. Can’t stand overgrown. I bought BC2 last night and am trying that out today, I heard it kicks MW2 in the ass.

It does, bc2 is really good. But you’ll get bored of it alot slower than you did mw2 and when you do get bored of it youll feel like playing mw2.

Read full topic

item.title: Modern Warfare 2 Stimulus Package
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Frell:

Fuck off with the political shit. It would be no different if we traded a sack of potatoes and a watermelon for a game. And within the past 10 years games have been really popular and its actually possible to make loads of money off of them unlike the N64. But i guess you’re one of those people who likes to let developers work their asses off for 4 years making a game thats actually good and then just pirating it.

I think you missed Speljohan’s point… also, capitalism is mostly economic and partially social, not political. I agree on the shit part though

Read full topic

item.title: Modern Warfare 2 Stimulus Package
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Tico, post:11, topic:334446”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=430845.msg3163199#msg3163199 date=1269769612]
[center][size=24pt]ARE YOU SUFFERING FROM MAPMATHY?[/size]

Everyone who hates consoles is just mad that its super hard for them to play with a controller and that developers dont care for shit about the pc community because consoles are where the money is at, which is why they’re making Crysis 2 for 360.

Game studio’s pc modo: Give it to them free or they’ll pirate it.[/quote]I love consoles, but new ones are shit. Also, fuck off capitalist scum, it’s money that has oversaturated the fucking game genre, as with every other fucking popular culture in the world.

Read full topic

item.title: Modern Warfare 2 Stimulus Package
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

[quote=“Tico, post:11, topic:334446”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=430845.msg3163199#msg3163199 date=1269769612]
[center][size=24pt]ARE YOU SUFFERING FROM MAPMATHY?[/size]
[/quote]

mapathy**

I can’t see them being spectacular, because I really don’t think they would’ve gone back to the cod4 style for the 3 new maps. Unfortunately, map wise, Treyarch will more than likely do a better job in DLC (the dlc maps in WaW were great).[/quote]
Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Modern Warfare 2 Stimulus Package
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:20, topic:334446”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=430845.msg3163490#msg3163490 date=1269799530]

Everyone who hates consoles is just mad that its super hard for them to play with a controller and that developers dont care for shit about the pc community because consoles are where the money is at, which is why they’re making Crysis 2 for 360.

wrong. Its easy to play on a PS3 or an X360, in fact i beat many other people who are just console gamers and yet i still prefer my PC, ps crysis 2 for 360 will look shit compared to its PC counterpart, its also on PS3, which while possibly able to get closer to the PC’s graphical results, will probably be kept as close to the X360 version so moronic 12 year olds dont cry over their xbox being left behind
[/quote]
Too bad they both have the same graphics, no noticeable changes.[/quote]
the calculations on a PS3 would allow for more of the subtle things in the game, and its the small things that make all the difference

Read full topic
